results.title: Beta-blockers for hypertension
results.text_hl: In the single trial involving participants aged 65 years and older, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was associated with an increased @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@ incidence compared to diuretics (RR 1.63, 95% CI 1.15 to 2.32).

citations.NLM: Wiysonge CS, Bradley HA, Volmink J, Mayosi BM, Opie LH. Beta-blockers for hypertension Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2017 Jan 20;1(1):CD002003. PMID: 28107561

results.title: The effect on HDL cholesterol of oxprenolol and atenolol.
results.text_hl: The HDL cholesterol lowering effect of @CHEMICAL_Oxprenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010096 @@@oxprenolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ observed in the present study may have clinical importance since such metabolic side effects have been postulated to counteract the beneficial effect of blood pressure reduction on development of @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@ in mild @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@.

results.title: Atenolol as a comparator in outcome trials in hypertension: a correct choice in the past, but not for the future?
results.text_hl: We calculated risk reductions for combined cardiovascular events, @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular death@@@, @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@ from groups of trials using @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ first-line and all beta-blockers first-line.

citations.NLM: Dahlöf B, Devereux RB, Kjeldsen SE, Lyle PA, Zhang Z, Edelman JM. Atenolol as a comparator in outcome trials in hypertension: a correct choice in the past, but not for the future? Blood Press. 2007;16(1):6-12. PMID: 17453746
